verses.text: Why boastest thou thyself \w in|strong="H1732"\w* mischief, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* mighty man? \w the|strong="H1732"\w* mercy \w of|strong="H4905"\w* God \add endureth \add*continually.
\w Thy|strong="H1732"\w* tongue deviseth very wickedness; \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sharp razor, working deceitfully.

\w Thou|strong="H3117"\w* lovest \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* more \w than|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2617"\w*; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* lying rather \w than|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* speak \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*
\w Thou|strong="H6213"\w* lovest \w all|strong="H6213"\w* devouring words, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H7423"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

God \w shall|strong="H7451"\w* likewise destroy \w thee|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H7451"\w* ever, \w he|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H7451"\w* take \w thee|strong="H2896"\w* up, \w and|strong="H2896"\w* pluck \w thee|strong="H2896"\w* \w out|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w thy|strong="H7451"\w* tent, \w and|strong="H2896"\w* root \w thee|strong="H2896"\w* \w out|strong="H7451"\w* \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* land \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* living. \qs \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*\qs*

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* righteous also \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* see \add it\add*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* fear, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* laugh \w at|strong="H3605"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \add saying\add*,

Lo, \w this|strong="H1571"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w man|strong="H2416"\w* \w that|strong="H2416"\w* \w made|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H1571"\w* God \w his|strong="H5422"\w* \w strength|strong="H5331"\w*; \w but|strong="H1571"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H2416"\w* \w his|strong="H5422"\w* riches, \w and|strong="H1571"\w* strengthened himself \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w his|strong="H5422"\w* wickedness.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w as|strong="H6662"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* green olive tree \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* house \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mercy \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God \w for|strong="H5921"\w* ever \w and|strong="H7200"\w* ever.

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w thee|strong="H7760"\w* thanks \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w*, \w because|strong="H7230"\w* \w thou|strong="H7760"\w* hast \w done|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*: \w and|strong="H6239"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* wait \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* name, \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* good, \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* presence \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* saints.
